name: King of Milito
description:
King of Milito

The king of milito has started a mindless war with the whole world. As a patronus of the land of milito, you protect this land from the swarm of soldiers from the whole world.

How To Play

You need to buy and place minions to protect the king.

You can move the minions to the enemy place to defeat them. However, this also applied to the enemy.

Enemies will come from the ground and the sky, the only minion that can placed on the sky is the sky Mage(cost 150 gold) with a different move set from the  one for ground.

Control:  left click to select

Keep defeating the enemies and survive as long as you can!

This is a game jam for the Score Space jam #17 where is theme is "Protect"
